description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Save the survivors! Multitudes are fleeing from the inner cities to citizens protection facilities. Hordes of zombies are roaming the cities and giving chase! With a powerful arsenal at your disposal, fight back the zombies and save the survivors.
description.short: Save the survivors! Multitudes are fleeing from the inner cities to citizens protection facilities. Hordes of zombies are roaming the cities and giving chase! With a powerful arsenal at your disposal, fight back the zombies and save the survivors.
